entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with periods of freezing drizzle in the evening and after midnight and with periods of rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
